description: Chinese New Years starts tomorrow and if you're looking for an easy recipe to kick off the celebrations, then I have the "cake" for you.  If you like mochi, then you're going to like nian gao. If you don't, well...maybe give it a try because you're opened to trying new things.  Nian gao is a cake you eat for Chinese New Years.
title: Coconut Green Bean Nian Gao - New Year Cake
